Anna Chumakova

Ukrainian photographer based in Cracow.

I am a visual artist open to crazy photo ideas.

My favourite type of work is fashion shooting and creating bright, eye-catching photo collages.

I also create calm and minimalistic photo shoots in the studio.

In addition, I am fond of photojournalism, partial to talk about social topics through photos.

anna.chumakova@gmail.com anna.chumakova
